highlights.text: Built lane-level analytics from graph-structured and image geospatial data to enable accurate last-meter navigation.
Prototyped GenAI guidance for micro-addressing and lane transitions, improving route prediction accuracy by 12%.
Orchestrated multi-LLM and multimodal models (vision + lane graph + text) with retrieval over lane/POI data for grounded instructions.
Deployed cloud-based pipeline on AWS with Docker, CI/CD and monitoring; scaled beyond 10K daily queries.
Led a cross-functional team of 5 optimizing SPECT geometry with ML/DL, improving spatial resolution by 18%.
Automated imaging pipelines with SQL, Pandas, and Airflow, cutting analysis throughput time by 30%.
Accelerated Monte Carlo reconstruction by 20% using simulation-informed modeling with GATE/ROOT.
Built AI agents (LangChain + MCP) on a RAG backend; ingestion via Airflow to S3/Postgres; tool use for search/code/data workflows.

Designed & deployed RAG: FAISS (dev) → Pinecone (prod), hybrid dense+BM25 retrieval, re-ranking, metadata filters, Redis caching, FastAPI service, MLflow evals (hit@k, MRR, faithfulness), citation-grounded answers.
Collaborated with oncologists & radiologists; delivered imaging tools that helped secure $800K funding.
Trained SSD-MobileNet to detect HDR ghost artifacts; reached 93% detection accuracy on internal validation.
Built large-scale HDR ghosting dataset with labeling guidelines and QA checks, improving robustness across scenes.
Implemented quantization and pruning for on-device deployment, +25% inference speed and −40% model size.
Shipped the model in the camera imaging pipeline; used on millions of Samsung phones.
Designed real-time computer vision system for automated parking; 96.8% detection accuracy and scaled to 100K images/day.
Built GAN + RNN/LSTM pedestrian traffic model with DEEP SORT; preprocessing boosted accuracy by 15%.
Presented system to client stakeholders; showcased impact on reducing energy costs via pedestrian-based power optimization.

projects.name: GAN-based Synthetic MRI Generation
projects.description: End-to-end GAN pipeline with U-Net/CNN priors to expand MRI dataset diversity.

highlights.text: Containerized training/inference; tracked experiments with MLflow.

projects.name: Transformer-based Text Classification
projects.description: Fine-tuned BERT on IMDb sentiment with PyTorch + Hugging Face.

highlights.text: Built clean training/eval pipeline and reproducible seeds.

projects.name: LLM Agents & Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
projects.description: Agents with tool orchestration (MCP) over a hybrid RAG stack (FAISS/Pinecone, dense+BM25, re-ranking).

highlights.text: LoRA-tuned open-source LLMs for efficient domain adaptation.

BCS^2: fast, adaptive 2-parameter clustering for telemetry/fleet analytics

story.title: Lane-level analytics & GenAI guidance
story.narrative: Delivered grounded, multimodal GenAI guidance for last-meter navigation using multi-LLM routing and lane/POI retrieval; production-ready cloud pipeline.

story.title: SPECT imaging platform & RAG agents
story.narrative: Hybrid RAG stack with evaluation harness; automated imaging pipelines; collaboration with clinicians led to funded adoption.

story.title: HDR ghost artifact detection at scale
story.narrative: Productionized on-device model with quantization/pruning; dataset creation and QA improved robustness across diverse scenes.

story.title: Automated parking CV system
story.narrative: Realtime detection and pedestrian flow modeling driving operational impact for client energy optimization.
